title: SAARC Finance Ministers: Meet now to help Sri Lanka
snippet: I suggest Sri Lanka calls for an urgent meeting of Finance Ministers of SAARC countries immediately, to be held in Colombo, to discuss how they can help Sri Lanka get out of its present economic crisis,

title: Sri Lanka interest rate hike not enough, rupee cannot be held at 230: Harsha
snippet: ECONOMYNEXT - Sri Lanka devaluation of the rupee to 230 to the US dollar will not help avert the foreign exchange crisis and the one percent rate hike was insufficient with inflation running double digits, opposition legislator Harsha de Silva said.
